title: Lancashire Textiles 2 Pack 16" x 16” (40 x 40cm) Quality Microfibre Super Bounce Fibre Cushion Pads Made in Britain with Our Luxury Hollowfibre Filling
features: Premium Cushion Inserts for Lasting Support: Generously filled to provide full, plump support while maintaining shape. Ideal for scatter cushions, sofa pillows, and throw pillows, offering both decorative appeal and soft, supportive comfort for all seating areas.

Variety of Sizes for Perfect Fit: Available in popular sizes like 15 x 15 inches, 16 x 16 inches, and 18 x 18 inches. These inserts fit seamlessly into your cushion covers, whether square or rectangular, giving you the flexibility to style your home your way.

Versatility for Every Space: Ideal for use on couches, beds, office chairs, and sofas. These inserts bring style and function, making them perfect for scatter cushions or lumbar support pillows, enhancing comfort and complementing your home decor.

Breathable and Durable Casing: Features a soft, breathable cover made to withstand frequent use and washes. The tightly woven casing prevents filling from escaping, ensuring that the cushion maintains its fullness and softness over time for lasting quality.

Convenient Multi-Pack Options: Choose from packs of 2, 4, 6, or 8 inserts to suit your needs. Whether updating a room’s decor or adding accent cushions, our multi-pack options provide flexibility and convenience, allowing you to refresh your space effortlessly.
description: Product Description Cushion Pads Made In Britain in a Wide Range Of Sizes Soft microfiber cushion pads are available in a range of sizes. Our standard cushion pad sizes include 12”/30cm, 15”/38cm, 16”/40cm, 18”/45cm, 20”/50cm, 24”/60cm, 26”/65cm, and 30"/80cm. If we don't offer the size you need, we offer a made-to-order service and can make inners to custom shapes and sizes. Previous page Get a plump, full look for your cushions We suggest a cushion pad a size larger than your cushion cover Next page 1 Cushion Inner Sizes 2 Cushion Inner Size Guide Use after Use... Springs Back To Shape Hollow fiber is known for its bouncy properties. it is produced to allow air to separate the fibers, creating a soft and fluffy cushion filling that will spring back into shape again and again. Previous page Quality Made In UK Made here at our mill in Lancashire, you have a high-quality product. Allergy Protection Synthetic fill and case are allergen-free so far less likely to cause any irritation Lofty Filling Our Hollowfibre passes through our fluffing machine and comes out soft, light, lofty and fluffy. Machine Washable Machine wash at 40° and tumble dry on a cool dry setting to keep them fresh and clean Next page 1 Made In Britain 2 Hypoallergenic 3 Hollowfibre Filling 4 Stay Fresh Explore the Lancashire Textiles Range of Cushion Pads Microfibre Cushion Pads Add To Basket Microfibre Cushion Pads Add To Basket Polycotton Cushion Pads Add To Basket Duck Feather Cushion Pads Add To Basket Superbounce Pillows Add To Basket Customer Reviews 4.5 out of 5 stars 2,182 4.3 out of 5 stars 256 4.3 out of 5 stars 55 4.5 out of 5 stars 1,729 4.5 out of 5 stars 592 Price £13.99 £ 13 . 99 £33.99 £ 33 . 99 £13.99 £ 13 . 99 £23.99 £ 23 . 99 £36.99 £ 36 . 99 Sizes 15”,16” & 18” 12”, 20”,22”, 24” & 26” 15”,16”,18”, 20”,24”,26” & 30" 15”,16”,18”, 20”,24”,26” & 30" Standard Pillow Size Casing Microfibre Microfibre Polycotton Cotton Polycotton Filling Hollowfibre Hollowfibre Hollowfibre Duck Feather Hollowfibre Made In Britain ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ Pack Sizes 2, 4, 6 & 8 2, 4, 6 & 8 2, 4, 6 & 8 2, 4, 6 & 8 2, 4 & 6
